document.full_text: yemeni security forces used live fire and tear gas thursday on protesters demanding an end to the rule of president ali abdullah saleh, wounding at least 84, activists said.
document.title: at least 84 wounded in new yemen clashes: activists
lines_and_colors: yemeni security forces used live fire and tear gas thursday on protesters demanding an end to the rule of president ali abdullah saleh, wounding at least 84, activists said.
